sentences.english: We will watch a lot of excerpts throughout the semester.
sentences.chinese: 我們這個學期會看很多錄影。

sentences.english: I schlep into the living room and program the TiVo myself.
sentences.chinese: 我把TiVo錄影機搬進客廳自己設定錄製程序。

sentences.english: At the time of the video Jackson looked almost identical to the statue.
sentences.chinese: 在當時的錄影帶裏傑克遜和那座雕像更爲相似。

sentences.english: Obama is expected to fly back to Washington after the show's taping.
sentences.chinese: 節目錄影完畢後，奧巴馬將飛回華盛頓。

sentences.english: Makes sure the official recordings are given to the Jury President after the competition.
sentences.chinese: 在比賽後，將大會官方錄影帶交給裁判長。

sentences.english: In my opinion, the best non-surfing activity is to watch surf videos. That subliminal power is very persuasive.
sentences.chinese: 我的意見是最好的非衝浪運動就是看衝浪錄影帶。

sentences.english: Rent a video tape of an English movie—and don't read the subtitles .
sentences.chinese: 租一部英語電影的錄影帶，但是不要看中文字幕。

sentences.english: The NVR will be auto-started very soon.
sentences.chinese: NVR錄影系統將會自動啓動。

sentences.english: The Organizing Committee shall prepare video tape recorders at each court in order to preserve the match contents.
sentences.chinese: 大會應於每個場地準備錄影機以便保存該比賽情形。

sentences.english: The same might be said of the music videos born of this album.
sentences.chinese: 同樣的評價可以套用到隨這張專輯誕生的音樂錄影帶。

sentences.english: I have a camcorder for personal use.
sentences.chinese: 我有一個自由的攝錄影機。

sentences.english: The thief tampered with several surveillance cameras.
sentences.chinese: 竊賊破壞了好幾臺監視錄影機。

sentences.english: So now in your music videos you've worked with Lee Da Hae and Lee Hyo Ri.
sentences.chinese: 你你和李多海和李孝利合作了你的音樂錄影帶。

sentences.english: Do you know where i can buy a video machine at a low price ?
sentences.chinese: 你知道我哪裏能低值買部錄影機嗎？

sentences.english: You were telling us when we off camera that you finished your latest album last night.
sentences.chinese: 剛剛錄影前你有告訴我你昨天晚完成了你最新的專集。

sentences.english: Georgina: Well, if you put the camera over there, she'll never know.
sentences.chinese: 如果你把錄影機放在那邊，她永遠都不會發現。

definition: the scene (of a crime, accident etc)/(on) the spot/(at) the site
to be present/to be on the scene
to show oneself/to appear/(of a deity) to appear in the flesh
camera lens/camera shot (in a movie etc)/scene
